      • overlap

        public Pair<java.util.Date,java.util.Date> overlap(Activity anotherActivity)
        Return a Pair Object that contains the start time and end time of the period when two activities have overlap
        Parameters:
        anotherActivity - another specific Activity Object
        Returns:
        a pair Object of the start time and end time of the overlapped period using a Pair Object, null if two activities are not overlapped

        Returns:
        true if the start times are the same, false otherwise
